Actions.Name: Side Guns
Actions.Exceed: Repeat the area effect, targeting the same or a new area in range.

Actions.Name: Flare Bomb
Actions.Description: The [name] flies 5 in a straight line. It drops a small blast area effect below it over any space it moved over. Characters in the area take 3 damage. The character in the center space must save or become stunned.

Actions.Name: Drop Supplies
Actions.Description: The [name] drops a supply crate, a height 1 destructible object (5 hp), in a free adjacent space. Any ally adjacent to the supply crate gains +1 boon on attacks and saves, and may cure themselves by spending 1 action. The [name] can have two of these crates active at once.

Actions.Name: High Altitude
Actions.Description: The [name] and any of its passengers drift high up, removing them from the battlefield. They all return in any valid space on the battlefield at the start of the [name]'s next turn.
